name: Bad style! Bad! [Userstyles]
description: When the admin ablates a style, instead of the friendly, red "Deleted!" message there is only "Sorry, there's no page here" and the admonition to "Go home" on an otherwise blank page. Not enough hellfire to suit me, so I replaced the message with a more informative screed.
additional_info: For example, https://userstyles.org/styles/114133/google-boobs-the-birth-of-venus (A very bad style indeed. Killed with fire, thank goodness.) Mr. Yuk is a trademark of Pittsburgh Children's. It was developed by Professor Moriarty, who founded the National Poison Center Network. (No, Moriarty wasn't poisoning people from coast to coast, he prevented them from being poisoned, so take that Sherlock Holmes.)
